question: Sanjay Kumar Mishra, who was seen in news recently, is the Chief of which organisation?
explanation:
The Chief of Enforcement Directorate Sanjay Kumar Mishra has recently got one-year extension, after completing two years of his tenure.
The 1984-batch Indian Revenue Service official was appointed as the Executive Director in 2018. As per the recent order of the Finance Ministry, the previous order has now been modified with approval from the President.
